salaryStep.title: Your Salary
salaryStep.note: The calculation is based on 8 hours of work per day, 20 working days per month.

productStep.title: Product Price
productStep.description: Fill in the price of the product you want to buy.
productStep.note: The result is for reference only, the actual amount may vary due to currency fluctuations.

alternatives.title: What else you could buy, if you don't buy this product?

empty.title: Something went wrong, please try again.

share.title: Look! I need {{timeCost}} hours to buy this product!
share.text: Want to know how much time you need to buy this product? Want to know what else you could buy with your salary? Check out this extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/what-can-i-buy/

instant: That’s instant — blink and it's gone.
Barely a moment! Might as well do it.
You'd spend more time thinking about it.
quick: That's just a coffee break! Go ahead.
A quick task worth the joy!
Barely 15 minutes — not bad at all.
a-fewHours: Not bad — a few hours well spent?
Could’ve watched a long movie instead.
Time enough to learn a skill... or not.
halfDay: That’s a half-day of your life. Choose wisely.
Would you trade an entire afternoon for this?
That's a long meeting’s worth of work.
The sun moves slower than this cost.
oneDay: A full day. Make it count.
Hope this brings at least a day's joy.
24 hours of your time... for what?
You could’ve taken a day trip instead.
A deep breath, a day's burn.
severalDays: This cost has a name... it's commitment.
Hope the ROI is worth the time.
You could've read a book trilogy.
oneWeek: One week of energy, gone in one decision.
Hope this lasts longer than a Friday mood.
Imagine a week of rest — or this item.
You just paid in weeks, not dollars.
coupleOfWeeks: That’s a couple weeks of hustle.
Are we budgeting or bleeding time?
severalWeeks: Several weeks... this is a lifestyle.
Hope you're not regretting it already.
This belongs in your life timeline.
It’s a season of effort in a box.
oneMonth: That’s almost a month of your life!
Is this worth more than your vacation?
You paid in time, not money.
manyMonths: This thing better spark joy daily.
You could’ve run a marathon — twice.
a-yearPlus: Hope it was worth the sacrifice.
